title: Easy Leg Exercises for Stroke Patients (Guided by a Physical Therapist)
description:
Regain your strength and mobility with these gentle leg exercises designed specifically for stroke patients!

Led by a friendly and experienced physical therapist, this 10-minute video guides you through a series of exercises you can easily do from the comfort of your chair. Lily, your therapist, will be right there with you every step of the way, offering clear instructions and helpful tips.

We'll focus on strengthening your glutes, hips, and ankles – key areas for improving your overall mobility.  Lily will show you how to modify each exercise, ensuring they're just right for you, no matter where you are in your recovery journey.

Whether you're a stroke survivor looking to regain your independence or a caregiver wanting to support your loved one, this video is your perfect companion. Let's take those first steps towards a stronger, more active you – together!

You can also download our free eBook + recovery newsletter with over 25 pages of free physical therapy exercises in a beautifully illustrated PDF.

Visit https://www.flintrehab.com to learn more!

 @Flintrehab  is a leader in research backed stroke and neuro rehabilitation tools designed to provide faster, more effective recovery from stroke, TBI, and spinal cord injury. Safe, FDA listed, and clinically validated to help you recover, Flint Rehab customers include 300+ rehab facilities, 45% of top-ranked hospitals, and over 10,000+ home customers across more than 41+ countries.

Learn more at https://www.flintrehab.com/
channelDescription: We build resources and tools for people recovering from stroke, TBI, and SCI. Learn more at www.flintrehab.com
